title: Take My Hand
description: A romcom reimagined as a buddy movie then a slasher flick and now a fun, family romp about Slaughterface and the beautiful state of Connecticut.
quote: Merry Christmas! I practice abstinence. Connecticut!
altHero: a man in a creepy baby mask and apron wearing a santa hat
alt1: the santa baby mask man walks into a dungeon-like room with blood on the walls, a woman in a cage, and a blue muppet
alt2: the woman in a cage (Maroney) looking very happy
alt3: the baby mask man raises a happy fist in the air
